definitions.definition: A place where prescription drugs are sold or dispensed .
The science of medicinal substances , inclusive of pharmaceutics , pharmaceutical chemistry , pharmacology , phytochemistry , and forensics .
The role or occupation of a pharmacist .

main_definition: ( countable ) A place where prescription drugs are sold or dispensed .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The science of medicinal substances , inclusive of pharmaceutics , pharmaceutical chemistry , pharmacology , phytochemistry , and forensics .
( uncountable ) The role or occupation of a pharmacist .
